sentence: John Fea @ Current: Ohio Senate candidate Josh Mandel does not believe in the separation of church and state.
author: Kyle Mantyla
title: Right Wing Round-Up: That’s Not Voltaire You’re Quoting

sentence: In March 2021, Twitter temporarily restricted Ohio U.S. Senate candidate Josh Mandel in Match for violating the social media platform's rules.
author: Charlotte Trattner
title: Ohio Bill Could Make It Easier to Sue Social Media Companies Over Censorship
The Trailer: In Texas, safe-seat candidates fight about the best way to be partisan

sentence: In Ohio, a super PAC supporting Republican Josh Mandel claimed in a TV ad that former state GOP chair Jane Timken’s family business moved jobs to China.
author: Tom Kertscher
title: 2022 candidates use ads vowing to be tough on China, or attacking rivals as too soft on China
